ThaiXplore.stack: React js,Express Js, MongoDB , Tailwind CSS
ThaiXplore.description: ThaiXplore is a full-stack web app inspired by the MICE industry, enabling users to plan and book custom event packages by combining services like hotels, car rentals,restaurants, and event organizers.

MilkDeliveryManagement.description: A mobile application for managing milk delivery operations. Supports CRUD for schools, milk factories, and ice factories, including Google Maps integration.

MiniRPGChronicle.description: Mini RPG Chronicle is a turn-based mobile game where players choose a class (Knight, Mage, Assassin) and battle monsters. Each class has unique stats, skills, and an inventory system. Features include animated combat, EXP-based leveling, and a profile system to track progress.

PortfolioWebsite.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, skills, and background. Features include multilingual support (EN/TH), responsive layout, and themes (light/dark mode).

SUNMI.description: During my internship at Sunmi Thailand, I contributed to the development of a full-stack web application aimed at facilitating product sales and streamlining operations through an admin dashboard. My primary focus was on frontend development, utilizing modern web technologies to create responsive and intuitive user interfaces.
